level.heading: Marking requirements for envelopes.
level.text: Envelopes or other materials which are used to enclose official mail shall bear upon its facing, in addition to the name and address of the agency mailing the official mail, the words "official business."

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-118
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-118, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-701.
